descriptions.content:
Some old or new neologisms are purely Tibetan scientific or vernacular inventions. Here are a few examples:

  • ལྕགས་རྟ་ “Bicycle” (Literally: “Iron horse”)
  • ལྕགས་བྱ་ “Airplane” (Literally: “Iron bird”)
  • རླུང་འཕྲིན་ “Radio” (Literally: “Air message”)
  • གཟུགས་མཐོང་རླུང་འཕྲིན་ “Television” (Literally: “Form-seeing radio”)
